rootItem.title: Version-agnostic anchor resource for codelist C160928

self.title: CDISC SEND Rad/Nuc Targeted Injury Model Response Terminology

definition: Terminology related to the type of radiation injury that is being induced in the animal.
name: Rad/Nuc Targeted Injury Model Response
preferredTerm: CDISC SEND Rad/Nuc Targeted Injury Model Response Terminology

terms.definition: Cardiovascular injury resulting from radiation exposure.
Central nervous system injury resulting from radiation exposure.
Skin injury resulting from radiation exposure.
Gastrointestinal injury resulting from radiation exposure.
Hematopoietic injury resulting from radiation exposure.
Liver injury resulting from radiation exposure.
Lung injury resulting from radiation exposure.
Kidney injury resulting from radiation exposure.
